Mistaken for being 6 years younger than I actually am. I don't know whether to be honoured or offended 😏
Friendship is a two way street. Don't expect me to stick around if you don't put ANY effort in. Cutting negativity out.

Today has been so productive! Great day 🙌🏼
Re-reading your tweets to @LaurenCimorelli about 5 times incase she decides to roast you for any mistakes you make 😂😂
@LaurenCimorelli You're being so active on social media recently. I kinda love it!
"Woah Mar, you look great today!" - wth, what do I look like every other day 😐

Why do the weekends only feel like about 4 hours long.....
I am so happy with the haircut I got yesterday. Probably my fave "short cut" yet!!! 👍🏼
